transcript: I work as closely as I can in no windows no sound that's how I work I don't want any distraction some people are like I listen to music when I work empirically you work less well even if you're balancing on your chair you're using brain power I want to use 100% of my power on the task at hand and that means that if I have also stressors outside of my life people who are bothering me not just like people literally interrupting me but just problems it's like I want to resolve those so that I can put all my attention here cuz if I'm trying to type it I'm thinking about this snafu I had with somebody deal with the snafu and then you'll be able to work more clearly
